{"id":954906082,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1684734788,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"44 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/954906082/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Encode and Decode Strings","memory":"21.2 MB","code":"class Codec {\npublic:\n\n    // Encodes a list of strings to a single string.\n    string encode(vector<string>& strs) {\n        string encoded = \"\";\n        for (const string &s : strs) {\n            encoded += to_string(s.size()) + '#' + s;\n        }\n        return encoded;\n    }\n\n    // Decodes a single string to a list of strings.\n    vector<string> decode(string s) {\n        vector<string> decoded;\n        for (int i = 0, n = 0; i < s.size();) {\n            n = 0;\n            while (isdigit(s[i])) {\n                n *= 10;\n                n += s[i++] - '0';\n            }\n            decoded.push_back(s.substr(++i, n));\n            i += n;\n        }\n        return decoded;\n    }\n};\n\n// Your Codec object will be instantiated and called as such:\n// Codec codec;\n// codec.decode(codec.encode(strs));","compare_result":"","title_slug":"encode-and-decode-strings","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
